input.activity_signal: Active company website found at nuso.cloud showing current business operations. LinkedIn profile indicates "NUSO (formerly Brightlink) delivers complex cloud communication solutions" suggesting ongoing operations. Recent web content from 2025-2026 discussing NUSO services and technology investments. Company appears to be operating under NUSO brand after rebranding from Brightlink.
input.product_summary: NUSO provides unified communications and cloud-based VoIP solutions, including hosted VoIP, SIP trunking, contact center services, and collaboration tools delivered through an authorized partner network.
